name: FindBuddy
0:
”Alexa,ask find buddy to look in the garden”
”look in the bedroom”
”look in the field”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: find buddy
des: Find Buddy is a simple, fun journey which takes you to various locations in an attempt to track down the fluffy black cat in question. The star of the story just seems to love wandering around. Each location has several different scenarios,along with helping to find Buddy there is a chance for some fun learning. To play along is quite easy,you simply have to choose where we should look,for instance,”look in the field”, or, look in the kitchen or look down by the river and so on. Find Buddy is just a fun quest for all skilled cat trackers. If it proves popular enough many more locations and scenarios will be added
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
